short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome Extension for quick tab shortcuts

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hotkeys gives you super-powered keyboard shortcuts to quickly manage you Chrome tabs!
Hotkeys provides two key features to help you navigate faster, and avoid opening the same tabs over and over again. 

***Use Control (or Command on OSX) + Period (.) to open the Extension once installed***

1. It allows you to save tabs or groups of tabs with a key shortcut of your choice. and map quick shortcuts to them

2. It allows you to quickly search for an open tab in any open Chrome window, so you can quickly switch between tabs with just your keyboard, and avoid opening the same sites in multiple tabs and windows.
